title: Late night karaoke, midnight Jacuzzis and the Spice Girls: Jennie Bond's life on the road with The Windsors
text:
As Harry, Meghan and Archie embark on their first royal tour as a family, former BBC Royal Correspondent Jennie Bond recalls the exhausting but thrilling memories of life on the road with the Windsors

"Was it you lot making that bloody awful noise last night?" The Prince of Wales was not in the best of moods.

We were on an exotic island off the coast of Queensland. It was a day off for royalty and media alike, in the middle of a busy tour of Australia and New Zealand. We had all been flown to Fraser Island, the world's largest sand island, for a bit of rest and recuperation.

If there's one thing that journalists know how to do, it's recuperate. Noisily, and with copious amounts of booze. And...
description: As Harry, Meghan and Archie embark on their first royal tour as a family, former BBC Royal Correspondent Jennie Bond recalls the exhausting but thrilling memories of life on the road with the Windsors
